scripts.dev: npm run build:preload && concurrently "vite --config renderer/vite.config.ts" "wait-on http://localhost:5173/index.html && electron ./electron/main.cjs"
scripts.build:preload: if exist electron\preload.cjs del electron\preload.cjs && tsc electron/preload.ts --module commonjs --outDir electron && ren electron\preload.js preload.cjs
